item.title: [Request] Complete NPC Drop Rate System, With Correct Drop
item.dc:creator: @D3i7y D3i7y
item.description:
@D3i7y wrote:

it’s not very nice to rip code but find a source that’s the same base and rip the code. so many use project insanity now days i’m sure you can find one to rip the code. Besides it’s not that hard if you think about it if you use eclipse. The errors will arise once you start removing code in the old source so then you know where to look for the most part.

I know people dislike when others rip code but it’s always been this way. Don’t give something out if you don’t want someone to use it

Read full topic

item.title: [Request] Complete NPC Drop Rate System, With Correct Drop
item.dc:creator: @HairyNips HairyNips
item.description:
@HairyNips wrote:

You seem to not understand the concept of the server help section.

We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.

We all want to help you, but you need to supply us with more information. Do you have a current base for the drop system but it isn’t working? What source are you using, etc.

Read full topic
